precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Windows XP Start menu will open.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The "Control Panel" option in the Windows XP Start Menu will become highlighted.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open in Classic View.
expected_results: There will be no observable change in the Control Panel interface.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is visible.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will become visible at the bottom of the screen.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open in Classic View.
action: Press the 'p' key, followed by the 'o' key.
expected_results: The "System" icon will be highlighted, and its description "View basic information about your computer system and configure accessibility options." will be visible.

precondition: The "Power Options" icon is visible in the Windows XP Control Panel.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled 'Turn off hard disks' and select 'Never'.
expected_results: The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu will display 'Never'.

precondition: The 'Turn off hard disks' option in the 'Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme' section is displayed as a dropdown menu.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu will display 'Never'.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close. The changes to the power scheme will be applied.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and displaying available options.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying the screen saver settings.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu currently displays 'Windows XP'.
action: Click the dropdown arrow of the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screensavers will appear in the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is open, displaying a list of available screensavers.
action: Click on "None" in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will close, indicating that "None" has been selected as the screensaver.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'OK' button at the bottom of the window.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel window is open, displaying various system configuration icons.
expected_results: The Display Properties window will open.
